member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.App
member.summary: Provides application-specific behavior to supplement the default Application class.

member.name: M:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.App.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes the singleton application object. This is the first line of authored code executed, and as such is the logical equivalent of main() or WinMain().

member.name: M:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.App.OnLaunched(Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.LaunchActivatedEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when the application is launched normally by the end user. Other entry points will be used such as when the application is launched to open a specific file.
member.param: Details about the launch request and process.

member.name: M:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.App.OnNavigationFailed(System.Object,Windows.UI.Xaml.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when Navigation to a certain page fails

member.name: M:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.App.OnSuspending(System.Object,Windows.ApplicationModel.SuspendingEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when application execution is being suspended. Application state is saved without knowing whether the application will be terminated or resumed with the contents of memory still intact.
member.param: The source of the suspend request.

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Common.BooleanToVisibilityConverter
member.summary: Convert between boolean and visibility

member.name: M:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Common.BooleanToVisibilityConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Convert bool or bool? to Visibility

member.name: M:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Common.BooleanToVisibilityConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Convert Visibility to boolean

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.SampleListPage
member.summary: Display an overview of all the samples and allow user to pick a sample to run

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.DynamicLayerLabeling
member.summary: Demonstrates dynamic layer labeling using LayerDrawingOptions of a dyanmic layer.
member.title: Dynamic Layer Labeling

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.DynamicLayerReordering
member.summary: Demonstrates changing the order of dynamic layers.
member.title: Dynamic Layer Reordering

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.DynamicLayerRendering
member.summary: Sample of using the GenerateRendererTask to create a class breaks or unique value renderer on the server without having to retrieve all the data to the client.
member.title: Dynamic Layer Rendering

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.GroupLayers
member.summary: Demonstrates the use of GroupLayers to contain related layers in a map.
member.title: Group Layers

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.SetInitialMapExtent
member.summary: Shows how to set the initial extent of the map (Map.InitialExtent).
member.title: Set Initial Map Extent

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.MapRotation
member.summary: This sample shows how to rotate a map using the MapView.Rotation property.
member.title: Map Rotation

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.MapGrid
member.summary: This sample shows how to enable a map grid using the MapView.MapGrid property. Grid Types: Latitude / Longitude, MGRS, UTM, and USNG
member.title: Map Grid

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.MapOverlays
member.summary: Demonstrates how to display map overlay elements in the MapView.
member.title: Map Overlays

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.SwipeMap
member.summary: Shows how to swipe one map over another.
member.title: Swipe

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.ShowMouseCoordinates
member.summary: Shows mouse and device coordinates when the user taps the device.
member.title: Show Mouse Coordinates

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.ShowMapScale
member.summary: Shows the map scale changing when you zoom in and out using the MapView.Scale property.
member.title: Show Map Scale

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.ShowMapExtent
member.summary: Shows how to handle the ExtentChanged event on the MapView and display extent properties at runtime. Since the Map is in wrap-around mode, absolute values represent the map extent on an infinite continuous grid where values on the X axis increase or decrease as you pan. Normalized values represent the map extent in the real-world and take the dateline (or current central meridian) into account.
member.title: Show Map Extent

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.SwitchBasemaps
member.summary: Demonstrates changing the basemap layer in a map by switching between ArcGIS tiled map services layers hosted by ArcGIS Online.
member.title: Switch Basemaps

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.SymbolsAndLabels
member.summary: Shows various types of the more advanced symbol types: Composite and CIM symbology.

member.name: M:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.SymbolsAndLabels.CreateGeometries
member.summary: XAML creation of polygon and polyline geometries are currently not supported, so here they are created in code. Points are generated in the XAML for this sample.

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.AddGraphicsXAML
member.summary: Demonstrates how to add graphics to a GraphicsLayer using markup

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.ArcGISLocalTiledLayerSample
member.summary: Demonstrates adding a local tiled layer from a tile package (.tpk) to a map.
member.title: ArcGIS Local Tiled Layer

member.name: M:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.ArcGISLocalTiledLayerSample.GetSingleFileAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Get a single file from the user
member.remarks: Copies the selected file to App Local Data before returning

member.name: M:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.ArcGISLocalTiledLayerSample.PickSingleFileAsync(System.String)
member.summary: FileOpenPicker for the user to select the a target file

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.BingLayerSample
member.summary: Demonstrates adding a Bing Maps layer to a Map in code. A Bing Maps key must be provided to view Bing Maps tiled map services.
member.title: Bing Maps Layer

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.OpenStreetMapLayerSample
member.summary: Demonstrates adding an Open StreetMap layer to a Map in XAML.
member.title: Open StreetMap Layer

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.WebTiledLayerSample
member.summary: Demonstrates adding a Web tiled layer to a map.
member.title: Web Tiled Layer

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.SetSpatialReference
member.summary: Demonstrates setting the extent and spatial reference of a map via the Map.InitialExtent property.
member.title: Set Spatial Reference

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.ArcGISDynamicMapServiceLayerSample
member.summary: Demonstrates adding an ArcGIS dynamic map service layer to a map
member.title: ArcGIS Dynamic Map Service Layer

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.ArcGISImageServiceLayerSample
member.summary: Demonstrates adding an ArcGIS image service layer to a map
member.title: ArcGIS Image Service Layer

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.LayerList
member.summary: Shows how to access layers in the map.
member.title: Layer List

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.LocationDisplay
member.summary: Demonstrates use of the location display, and also how to create a custom location provider
member.title: Location Display

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.RandomProvider
member.summary: This is serves as a custom location provider - in this case creating a randomly roaming location for simulating movement, accuracy, speed and heading changes.

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.OverviewMap
member.summary: This sample demonstrates displaying an overview map to indicate the extent of the parent map.
member.title: Overview Map

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.ImageServiceRasterFunctions
member.summary: Demonstrates applying raster functions to an image service layer.

member.summary: Demonstrates adding an ArcGIS tiled map service to a Map in XAML.

member.summary: Demonstrates displaying an WmsLayer on a map. The WmsLayer allows users to display Open GIS Consortium (OGC) WMS layers.
member.title: WMS Layer

member.summary: Demonstrates adding a WMTS layer to a Map in XAML.
